headline: How Much ‘Cats’ Can a Person Take?
abstract: The assignment: Head to Boston to see the touring stage show and the movie musical all in one day. The result: a purr, a yowl or both?
lead_paragraph: BOSTON — “I wanted to go because I have a cat,” Jack Maloney, 9, said, gnawing a sour gummy.
keywords: Old Possum's Book of Practical Cats (Book)
